text: Java: I like that square Issac M ceramic watch. But I agree with some of the reviews that square and rectangular watches are harder to read. I've walked around all day with the time set on the wrong hour. But after all the round style, the square and rectangular watches are very interesting visually. I have 2 Invicta rectangular ceramic watches, and I love the look.... but I got the men's size, so they are a bit larger, not oversized.

thread.title_full: Re: WATCH COLLECTORS ....APRIL 2017 - Page 5 - Blogs & Forums
